paragraph.heading: MISSION STATEMENT:
paragraph.text: Our missions, as part of a strong national organization, is working to ensure that all girls and women have equal opportunities and equal access to quality education within a peaceful and secure environment where their human rights are respected.

paragraph.heading: MANDATE:
paragraph.text: CFUW Saskatoon is committed to improving the status of women and girls through education and to advancing human rights, equality and social justice.
